title: Wake
description: **** The final installment, Eden (The Runners, Part Five) is now available! ****Adam and Eve are trapped in the basement of the safe house, with Kappa soldiers right on top of them. In order to escape, Eve has to reveal shocking news Adam, risking their friendship, and even their sanity.Questions are answered, and lies are uncovered. But sometimes, the truth has more consequences than them allAt 10,425 words, "Wake" is the longest in "The Runners" series.More in "The Runners" Runner (The Runners, Part One)Caught (The Runners, Part Two)Rescued (The Runners, Part Three)Wake (The Runners, Part Four)Eden (The Runners, Part Five)Coming The Intruders (Visitors Trilogy, #1)
author: Logan Rutherford
